dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Fabiana - Adepi / Internet [mailto:adepi.internet@gmail.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2006 11:34 AM
To: Copyright; Legal Response
Subject: Copyright Infringement



December, 20, 2006

 


Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures


IP Address:  70.86.120.42 <http://70.86.120.42/>  (www.subtitles.com.br
<http://www.subtitles.com.br/>  ) 

Date of Infringement: December, 20, 2006

 
 
Dear ThePlanet 

 

ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the
following motion picture production and distribution companies: 

 

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. 

Disney Enterprises, Inc. 

Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. 

Paramount Pictures Corporation 

TriStar Pictures, Inc. 

Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation 

United Artists Pictures, Inc. 

United Artists Corporation 

Universal City Studios, LLLP 

Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. 

 

We have received information that, on the above noted date, the following IP
addresses, were used to offer or to materially contribute to the offering of
streaming or downloadable copies of subtitles copyrighted motion pictures. 

 

            The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to:

 

Original Heading: Casino Royale

Translated Heading: Cassino Royale

Sony Pictures

http://www.subtitles.com.br/legenda/2686/ <http://www.subtitles.com.br/legenda/2686/> 



Original Heading: Miami Vice
Translated Heading: Miami Vice 

UIP

http://www.subtitles.com.br/legenda/2636/ <http://www.subtitles.com.br/legenda/2636/> 

 

  Original Heading: Step Up
Translated Heading: Ela Dan
